sentences: Michael Lamont Bivins (born August 10, 1968) is an American singer, rapper, manager, actor, and producer, and a founding member of New Edition and Bell Biv DeVoe.
Bivins was born in Boston, Massachusetts.
Bivins also produced The New Edition Story, a biographical miniseries that ran on BET in 2017.
Most recently, he appeared in the basketball film Crossover as the character, Heart Attack.
